modName: Realistic Post Processing with reduced grainyness
summary:
My own tweaks to the post processing injection mod

Going for a more realistic look, less colour saturation and less \"grainy\" look. Reduced sharpness also.
descriptionHtml:
Step 1: Download and install this mod:  http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=131
(you need version 1.3 for this mod to work)

Step 2: Download the mod file here

Step 3: Paste the file into your skyrim install folder (njFX_Settings.n)
e.g. Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim

Step 4. When asked to overwrite file click yes.

Installed!

To uninstall just use the uninstaller that comes with the main Injector Mod itself.


Use pause key in game to switch the mod on/off.
author: HuNtOziO
